chapter.title: Schema Information
chapter.para: The navigator displays the schema of a datasource in a hierarchical structure. Top level elements are the datasources.

note.para: Uncollapsing and collapsing a node doesn't result in refreshed data. To refresh a node right-click on that node and choose Refresh from the popup menu.

chapter.para: Depending on the selected element a right click on the node will present a popup menu with commands for that node.
